item.title: The axiomatic method: its origin and purpose
item.description: This article is written by Prof. S. D. Agashe. I greatly enjoyed it when I was a master student. Euclidean geometry and the axiomatic method Euclid’s Elements constitutes the earliest extant substantial presentation of a body of material in the axiomatico-deductive form . Through it the subject of geometry got permanently associated with axiomatico-deductive formulation which was then viewed as a method, so much so that the expression ‘more geometrico’ (the geometric way) became synonymous with axiomatico-deductive formulation.
